name: Delta Sword
description:
How to Play

Press the W,A,S,D key to Walk.
Press the Spacebar to Jump.
Press the LShift to Run.
Press the Right Click to Aim.
Press the Left Click to Attack.
Press the R to Reload Ammo.

Team Members

Mr.Atthaporn Kaothan 620117010002
Mr.Suphakorn Janjang 620117010024
Mr.Thanetsak Muangpun 620117010025
Mr.Minrawat Premrot 620117010034
Mr.Apiwat Surakhai 620117010035
Mr.Rathanon Juntee 620117010036

Story

Go on a secret mission to end the war by having to eliminate the existing enemy and destroy.
The energy bar that controls the robots to shutdown the robots before completing the final mission, he must successfully defeat the strong robot boss.

Missions

Mission 1: Delta go destroy the power tower located at the gas station, school, hamburger shop.
Mission 2:  Delta find the destroyer boss and deal with it.
